forecast.name: This Afternoon

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 75. Heat index values as high as 102. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 100. West wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 65. Northeast wind 2 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 9pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 9pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 4am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 62, with temperatures rising to around 64 overnight. West wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
